About  Company

Sema is transforming software maintenance so organizations can focus on creating the future, not fixing the past.

Our solutions provide unprecedented visibility into your code and development teams, so you can make the right choices, faster.

Get a Demo

Software maintenance is expensive. It can eat up 50-60% of an organization’s software development budget.

Meanwhile, engineers who understand legacy code are retiring. For the developers left, fixing old code can be “soul sucking.”

Sema is here to fix all of that.

Learn How

Lokakṣema

Sema is named for Lokakṣema, a Buddhist monk who translated foundational Indian Buddhist texts into Chinese.

He brought the knowledge and wisdom of one world into another.

Lokakṣema is Sanskrit for “welfare of the world”.

Ready to get started?
